sentences.en: " Bad,'said Wu looking worried and toying with his moustache.
sentences.cn: “ 不行, ” 姓吴的忧愁地说;但随即咽住了,捻着唇边仅有的几根二三分长的髭须.

sentences.en: He has decided to grow a beard and a moustache.
sentences.cn: 他已经决定留起络腮胡子和髭。

sentences.en: He was heavily-built and sported a red moustache.
sentences.cn: 他身材魁梧，留着红色的八字胡。

sentences.en: He was short and bald and had a moustache.
sentences.cn: 他个头不高，秃顶，留着八字胡。

sentences.en: He was white, with brown shoulder-length hair and a moustache.
sentences.cn: 他是个白人，留着棕色的齐肩发并蓄着小胡子。

sentences.en: Her fiance & 1 & sported a neat ginger moustache.
sentences.cn: 她的 未婚夫 留着触目的姜黃色小胡子,修剪得很整齐.

sentences.en: It'sa pity you shaved your moustache off.
sentences.cn: 真可惜，你刮掉了小胡子。

sentences.en: Mid-fifties, short black hair, grey moustache, distinctive Russian accent. Need I go on?
sentences.cn: 五十四五岁，黑色短发，灰色八字胡，明显的俄国口音，还需要我继续说吗？

sentences.en: The beginnings of a moustache showed on his upper lip.
sentences.cn: 他的上唇部位开始长胡子了。

sentences.en: The man's heavy moustache hid his upper lip completely.
sentences.cn: 那个男人浓密的髭须完全遮住了他的上唇。

sentences.en: Then he stood in the lobby, chewing the ends of his moustache.
sentences.cn: 然后,他站在门厅里, 咬着胡子尖.

sentences.en: They don't like my moustache and my long hair, they get at me whenever they can.
sentences.cn: 他们不喜欢我的小胡子和长发，一有机会便数落我。

sentences.en: Whether I've got a moustache or not it's all the same to me.
sentences.cn: 我留不留胡子都无所谓。

trans.tran_en: hair that grows on a man’s upper lip
